item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: Major Features Aspose.PUB for C++ 24.1 is ready for use with Aspose C++ products ver 24.1. Got Queries? If you have any query related to Aspose.PUB for C++ API, please feel free to write to reach us on Aspose.PUB forum. We’ll be glad to assist you with your inquiries.
